I LOVE TFC. Perfect community, No cheating, Oh yeah and you can literally fly to absurd heights by shooting the floor with a rocket launcher and using the resulting explosion to propel yourself into the sky.

The only team fortress without cheaters.

This game is good, but I'd rather just play Team Fortress or Team Fortress 2. I never really liked the GoldSrc engine, because it doesn't look that good and is kind of clunky. I also don't like how little they changed from the original Team Fortress, though, adding teleporters to the game is a good exception. There's also some really good maps that from it, like Dustbowl, Badlands, and Avanti, with Dustbowl and Badlands being good enough to be put in TF2 (with a bit of change to them, for balance and gameplay).

[h1]Плюсы[/h1]
1. Отличная графика 
2. Неплохой интерфейс 
3. Хорошие карты
4. Интересная
5. Динамичная 
6. Отсутствует донат
[h1]Минусы[/h1]
1. Актив умер (Press F to pay respects)
2. Не сразу поймёшь как играть за шпиона или инженера
[h1]В итоге[/h1]
Рекомендую поиграть в него, не смотря на то что актив умер, но есть активные сервер но их правда мало. Если хотите найти активные сервера то советую в мониторинг серверов полазить там должны быть активные сервера.

Team Fortress Classic is a very different game in comparison to TF2, mostly because of 2 things, grenade spam and limited abilities, the first one being a huge issue that was actually resolved in the sequel, in a game where projectiles fly everywhere, grenades just slow the game down too much, plus making it an annoying type of chaos, also in comparison, the mercenaries have fewer abilities like engineer not being able to pick up his buildings and soldier taking way too much damage for rocket jumping, I know maybe it doesn't seem very fair to make a review that is only really a comparison, but being realistic, most people or either got this on a Valve collection or just were curious after playing Team Fortress 2, so do I recommend it, not really.

6/10

Este juego ha influenciado a muchos juegos multijugador de hoy en dia, ya que es el primer FPS por clases de la historia pero...¿Realmente vale la pena comprar este juego teniendo en cuenta que team fortress 2 es gratis, es mejor, tiene mas jugadores, mas contenido, mas variedad, mas modos, mapas, armas, etc.? Bueno, yo tengo este juego porque me venía en el pack de todos los half-life, pero yo no me lo compraría por separado, pero comprarlo o no es decisión de cada uno, yo solo estoy dando mi opinión. 

Y lo poco que he jugado me ha gustado bastante, es un buen juego desde luego, y en su día fue muy innovador introduciendo el sistema de clases que usan muchos videojuegos hoy en día, y tiene varias mecánicas interesantes que en team fortress 2 no están. El unico problema es que ha envejecido mal, y no tiene muchos jugadores, y hay muchas opciones mejores de shooter por clases, como team fortress 2 valga la rebundancia. 

Pero a pesar de todo es un buen juego, y si no te corre el team fortress 2 en tu PC este juego puede ser un buen reemplazo, y si te gustan los shooters clasicos tambien te gustará.
Игроков конечно нет, но, сама по себе классная.

This was the game before TF2. There is a fairly active playerbase, with a few servers with a maximum of around 15 people. Players used to TF2 will most likely find this game very hard (Like me.) A very good shooter that I would recommend if you buy it with the VCP (Valve Complete Pack)
I've been playing this game since 2002 when I was in grade 9, gotta love it!
i have been playing this game for years and i have enjoyed it so much it never gets old
A classic. nuff said.

Team Fortress Classic would be a great and fun game if most people still even played it.
Most of the servers are completely devoid of players making it so that spending money on this game is a waste of money because you won't get to play it very often as it's hard to even find servers with players, and whenever you do find servers with players, it's either they're very new and learning everything just like you or gods at the game who have been playing since day one, a much lower spit than in TF2.
Other than that, the game design does genuinely seem very good, and if you can find matches with people who are at similar skill level while you have some skill yourself, it'll be a fun ride, though not many play it anymore and I don't know if many others will for much longer.

[h1]На полку истории[/h1]

Игра во многом уступает старенькой CS, но все же народ в нее иногда поигрывает. Серверов много, но примерно 80% из них пусты. Все уже давно ушли во вторую часть, но те кто еще играет могут задать жару "зеленым" игрокам. Все по закону стареньких шутеров: игра стремительная и не прощает медлительных.

Combat is fast and deadly, true to it's arena fps roots. Shows it's age but still fun. Some classes do feel pretty weak though. Medic is pretty much a direct upgrade to Scout, and Pyro simply can't match the damage output of other classes.

No me costó encontrar un server y lo pasé muy bien. Eso si, hay que tener en cuenta que si no eres de estados unidos vas a tener mucho lag

9/10
